title: How to fix Fiora
body:
Make Q cost 40 at all levels so she actually has mana issues (her max rank mana cost on Q is 40 so this doesn't hurt her late game at all).

Remove her attack speed slow. It makes no sense to have this attached to an ability that can literally block ults. It's particularly difficult to avoid as a melee champion. And this is just extra power she doesn't need to have. She already can proc a massive heal, does %true damage so you can't itemize vs her and between her W and Q prioritizing vitals, it makes disabling her via various anti-DPS spells (AS slows, MS slows, etc) virtually impossible. A well played fiora has almost no windows of weakness and that's honestly bullshit.

replies.body: Her Q isn't supposed to be mana gated, but rather her E. Hell, the only reason she has mana at all is that being able to spam E off CD would make her too strong a laner; beyond that's she's basically a manaless champion and Riot clearly intended her mana costs to not be much of a barrier unless she spams her E too much.

^ This. 

Yasuo and Tryndamere are also Skirmishers and are manaless, as are a lot of other melee champions that rely on spamming skills to do anything. Aside from Tanks and Juggernauts, it actually seems almost rare for Riot to release melee champs that actually use mana normally these days. 

Fiora is supposed to be spamming her Q as long as she is hitting things with it, it's supposed to be gated by cooldown (a really long one if she uses it to run away) rather than mana cost. The intent seems to be to let Fiora jump in to proc vitals and run away as her only means of poke (which still requires her to get in melee range) but restrict her E with mana to limit her ability to fully trade and all-in opponents. I think an early hit to her E's mana cost could work nicely to ease up Fiora's lane pressure without crippling her.

Fiora really is a problem, just not in your opinion.

Considering Fiora's win-rate has been pretty consistently ~51% despite being extremely popular, the data says she really isn't a problem.

Is she commonly played? Yes.
Is she incredibly annoying for many people? Yes.
Is she so powerful that you are at a statistical disadvantage if the enemy picks her? No, not really.

Her win-rates are so consistently average that I really doubt Riot will do anything about her any time soon. A light nerf to trim her play rate a bit perhaps, but she hardly needs the gutting some people here are calling for.

We all should know by now that the Boards accounts for a very tiny portion of the playerbase, and that just because people complain about something doesn't automatically mean it's OP. So I'm more inclined to think that some people on the Boards just hate Fiora and are being extra loud because she popular right now.

Fiora actually does have some mana issues. If you want to split push fast on Fiora you have to spam Q and E to wave clear. If you do that you run out of mana fairly quickly. Increasing the mana cost on Q I don't think would make Fiora more fun to play against. It would just make her have to recall or steal blue buff more in order to have the same impact. 

I do agree the attack speed slow on W sucks to play against. But I'm not sure about removing it completely without compensating Fiora in some way. It is a very strong aspect of her kit and W has an extremely long cool down to begin with. Removing it completely I think would make her far to weak in 1v1 situations where she should be strongest.

Fiora actually has massive windows of weakness that are very easy to take advantage of if you realize how long her cool downs are. Specifically in the  lane phase. Her cool downs at level 3 when she has all of her spells are 16 seconds on Q, 24 seconds on W, 13 seconds on E. If Fiora wastes her W or misses Q and gets the long cool down thats a very large window of opportunity in which you can put some serious damage on Fiora that she cannot trade back. 

Also Fiora is doing well but she isn't crazy at the moment. Her current win rate is 51% with a 15% pick rate according to OP.GG. And in pro play her current stats for NA are 1-3 and for LCK 1-4. She is strong but she is not busted. If anything is busted its the new {{item:1054}} that made her early game more survivable and {{item:3812}} which is far too strong right now for anyone that can use it.
